DOC.brief_summary: This pilot community-based research study examine effect specific environmental social factor physical activity , fitness , health middle school Hispanic child live inner-city community .

DOC.detailed_description: Our primary hypothesis disparity community 's potential physical activity nutrition , realize fitness health child , attribute specific environmental social factor . `` Built environment '' study date measure potential physical activity look social factor mediate individual 's activity within particular environment . The unique aspect proposal development model explain physical , social , cultural , nutritional SEM layer interact create gap potential realize physical activity . This project utilize novel technology : 1. identify analyze characteristic social build environment inhibit enhance physical activity healthy nutrition ; 2. determine direction extent influence variables child 's activity , nutrition , health ; 3. gather ideas student , parent , school staff inform potential health campaign reduce prevent obesity community . To address goal demonstrate causal relationship physical activity social-nutritional factor within build environment , follow specific objectives/aims address : Specific Aim 1 : Assess build environment energy requirement movement , nutrition option , suitability outdoor physical activity , child 's actual physical activity energy expenditure within environment . Specific Aim 2 : Assess impact child 's social environment movement nutrition choice within build environment . Specific Aim 3 : Conduct quantitative assessment child 's fitness , obesity , indicator metabolic health . Specific Aim 4 : Develop quantitative model Specific Aims 1-3 describes causal relationship among child 's physical health , community `` healthfulness , '' mediate factor attitude , perception , behavior .
